title: Mark of the Star Guardian
body: plz tell me its still possible to get it

replies.body: The Mark of the Star Guardian is no longer available for unlock.  The [quiz ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/star-guardian-2016#FPquiz)can still be taken, however!  I don't ahve any information on the icon making a return, but I suggest bookmarking the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page to stay up to date just in case.  Fingers crossed!
